name: Dumpster Doc (Anthony Palerino)
description:
Become an underground dumpster doctor! Treat patients from all walks of life, from shots to being shot!  Dumpster Doc is a resource management game that focuses on collecting and utilizing dump supplies to treat patients.  Collect clinic supplies by rummaging through a sprawling ocean of trash. Use these supplies to macgyver medical tools to treat patients.  

-note the Raccoon that steals from you is a little janky. 

Dumpster Doc is a student game created at the University of Utah in one semester by:

Anthony Palerino (myself) - engineer

Neepun Gupta - engineer

Xiaoyan Zhang - 3D artist

Cameron Rivard - 3D artist

Erika Prestwich - 2D/3D artist

Gregor Gonzales - designer/writer

Wesley Fung - sound designer

-made in Unreal Engine 4
